version_description:
• Phone 5 optimized
• Enhanced the user interface to allow better organization of your library
• Bug fixes

• New tracks and bundles added
• Enhanced store with new graphics
• Limited free previews
• Stability improvements
• iOS 5.0.1 bug fix

• added retina support for the new iPad
• minor bug fixes

Brand new Transitions Wake and Sleep timers allow you to choose an ambience for sleeping in addition to one for waking.

Thunderstorms have synchronized lightning animations and a new "flash screen" mode for use in a dark room for an incredibly real
- New and improved earbud optimization mode for small speakers and earbuds

We’re back! Time to get our code all neat and tidy, primarily involving tweaks to the UI for the newest devices. Production of new tracks has begun and will be available soon. This update prepares the way.
